    Hire students graduating out of NavGurukul

    Hire competitive talent trained to work on live projects & production ready systems from Day 1.

    Increase the diversity of your work place & take a step to build a more inclusive society.

    What makes our students unique?

    Monthly Hackathons to reinforce the value of shipping fast

    Self and peer learning to ensure that the students are self starters

    Curriculum works on learning by doing supported by in-depth theory to bridge the gap in theory & practice

    Manage the entire campus via a student council, learning leadership on the field

    Contact us directly at tnp@navgurukul.org for hiring or freelancing projects.
